text: today's recipe is pretty fun and I think
it's gonna be a go-to side for you all
summer long it's deviled egg potato
salad
so there are egg whites in the salad and
the yolks of hard-boiled eggs are used
to make the dressing you need to start
with four hard-boiled eggs give great
how-to videos on how to boil eggs on our
website if you're interested save the
whites for the salad match your cooked
yolks and then to that add a half a cup
of mayonnaise a tablespoon of white or
white wine vinegar a teaspoon of yellow
mustard a pinch of smoked paprika or
sweet paprika if you don't like smoked
also two tablespoons of water there are
some lumps in it but that's okay because
it's gonna get past the rusev but you do
want most of the yolk to be incorporated
into the dressing so do your best to
push them in there this is one and a
half pounds of fingerling potatoes that
have been boiled and have any small
potato will do though pass it through a
sieve it's not completely necessary but
if you want perfection use that extra
tool really it's not going to remove the
egg as much as just get it finer so that
it's all smooth stir that just a little
bit this is three tablespoons of red
onion you can add that to your salad
chop up your egg whites and add those
you can do a little nice dice or you can
just chop it up add that and then one
stalk of celery
you want to season everything with salt
obviously a little bit and that's it
doubled egg potato salad sprinkle it
with a little bit more paprika before
you serve it to give it that classic
deviled egg look and then eat up and
enjoy hmm it's just like deviled eggs
it's so good you guys give it a try
you
